item.description:
We have gotten a free class especially for the South Shore Fitness Meetup Group!  Join us for a combo Cardio and Tower Pilates class at the Bodyscapes Fitness in the Hingham Shipyard.  We will be split into groups to cycle through the different stations. 

We need a minimum of 5 people or this will be cancelled.

Maximum of 12 people to allow for adequate time on the Tower Pilates machines.

A unique opportunity to experience the Pilates reformer in a small group setting along with full body circuit training to get the heart rate up.

 

Participants enjoy half  the class working on the Pilates reformer, designed to improve strength, coordination, flexibility, balance, and stabilization. The Reformer is a piece of equipment that provides finely tuned resistance with a series of springs and ropes.

 

The second half of the class is a cardio-intensive full body circuit training designed to get your heart rate going while challenging you with circuits of weights, functional training and cardio.
item.how_to_find_us: I will meet everyone at the reception area

group.name: The South Shore Fitness Meetup Group

item.name: Pilates and Cardio Class
